scripts.build:binary:linux: NODE_ENV=production bun build index.tsx --compile --target bun-linux-x64 --outfile dist/Calil-management-app-linux-x64
scripts.build:binary:windows: NODE_ENV=production bun build index.tsx --compile --target bun-windows-x64 --outfile dist/Calil-management-app-win-x64.exe
scripts.build:binary:mac: NODE_ENV=production bun build index.tsx --compile --target bun-darwin-x64 --outfile dist/Calil-management-app-macos-x64 && NODE_ENV=production bun build index.tsx --compile --target bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile dist/Calil-management-app-macos-arm64
